mapper.select: SELECT ucs.`id` AS `id`, ucs.`user1_id` AS `user1_id`, ucs.`user2_id` AS `user2_id`, ucs.`status` AS `status`, ucm.`content` AS `last_message`, ucm.`sender_id` AS `last_message_sender_id`, ucm.creation_time AS `last_message_time` FROM (SELECT `id`, `user1_id`, `user2_id`, `status` FROM `user_chat_session` WHERE `id` = #{id}) ucs INNER JOIN (SELECT `id`, `session_id`, `creation_time`, `content`, `sender_id` FROM `user_chat_message` u WHERE u.`session_id` = #{id} ORDER BY `id` DESC LIMIT 1) ucm ON ucs.`id` = ucm.`session_id`

SELECT ucs.`id` AS `id`, ucs.`user1_id` AS `user1_id`, ucs.`user2_id` AS `user2_id`, ucs.`status` AS `status`, ucm.`content` AS `last_message`, ucm.`sender_id` AS `last_message_sender_id`, ucm.creation_time AS `last_message_time` FROM (SELECT `id`, `user1_id`, `user2_id`, `status` FROM `user_chat_session` WHERE `user1_id` = #{userId} OR `user2_id` = #{userId}) ucs INNER JOIN (SELECT `id`, `session_id`, `creation_time`, `content`, `sender_id` FROM `user_chat_message` WHERE `id` IN (SELECT MAX(`id`) FROM `user_chat_message` GROUP BY `session_id`) ORDER BY `session_id`) ucm ON ucs.`id` = ucm.`session_id` LIMIT #{pageCapacity} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT `id`, `user1_id`, `user2_id`, `creator_id`, `status`, `creation_time`, `modifier_id`, `modification_time` FROM `user_chat_session` WHERE (`user1_id` = #{user1Id} AND `user2_id` = #{user2Id}) OR (`user1_id` = #{user2Id} AND `user2_id` = #{user1Id})
